span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 使疏远，离间，使感情失和： to arouse especially mutual enmity or indifference in where there had formerly been love, affection, or friendliness
【例】 he estranged several of his coworkers 他和好多同事疏远了
【近】 alienate, disaffect, disgruntle, sour
【反】 reconcile 和好

【记】 en + strange 陌生→使陌生→疏远
